Hi Everyone- I am working on a project for a client where we want to automate changes in number variables based on the day of the week (specifically: change pricing of line items on the weekends as opposed to weekdays). I am unable to find any way to dynamically find 'today's date' which at least I could use to create a workaround.

*Question*
Is there any way to identify what day of the week it is in HubSpot so I can build a workflow, or do I need to build an APP to make that work?

Thanks for any insights you can provide!
